pageTitle: KINEPOLIS GROUP : Update regarding the share buy-back program | 4-Traders
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {74328=This press release was issued by Kinepolis Group NV and was initially posted at http://www.kinepolis.com. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2012-03-16 07:14:14 AM. The issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein.}
textBeforeTable: In accordance with the regulations with respect to the acquisition of own shares Kinepolis Group NV informs that within the framework of the share buy-back program as announced per 29th of February 2012, the following transactions took place in the period between 8th March 2012 till 14th March 2012, on the stock exchange market NYSE Euronext Brussels and this in accordance with the mandate given by the Extraordinary General Meeting of 20th May 2011:   Regulatory release *Required fields Message : (You can enter multiple email addresses separated by commas) To* : From* : Name : Last Name : Send by mail: 03/16/2012 | 01:25am US/Eastern
textAfterTable: After aforementioned transactions the total number of own shares amounts to 441.542 on the date of 14th March 2012. This information is also available on the website: http://investors.kinepolis.com KINEPOLIS GROUP NV Public limited company that is making or has made a public appeal to savings Eeuwfeestlaan 20, 1020 Brussels Enterprise Number VAT BE 0415.928.179 RLP Brussels This press release was issued by Kinepolis Group NV and was initially posted at http://www.kinepolis.com. It was distributed, unedited and unaltered, by noodls on 2012-03-16 07:14:14 AM. The issuer is solely responsible for the accuracy of the information contained therein.
